summary: Completed comprehensive testing of YAMA+ site - all required features working perfectly

minor_issues.issue: Returns 422 instead of expected 400 when missing required fields
minor_issues.impact: Not blocking - expected behavior for missing data

minor_issues.issue: Root endpoint returns HTML instead of JSON

passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with YAMA logo and navigation
Products displayed on homepage (16 products via API, 6 visible elements)
Admin login works with credentials admin@yamaplus.com / Admin123!
Registration form works perfectly with all fields (name, email, password, phone)
Fortune wheel game button visible in bottom right corner
Fortune wheel modal opens with proper game interface and prizes
Game API active with roue de la fortune configured
Cart, categories, and flash sales APIs working
